There is one good hotel with star hotel facilities " HOTEL WESTERNGATZ " derived from the hills Western Gatz surrounded around Theni.The website is www.westerngatz.com 

The hotel has facilities as SRI NANDHA RESTAURANT which is an air conditioned multi cuisine restaurant serving Continental, Chinese and Indian dishes and a Banquet Hall and a Bar.The hotel is situated on the main road with ample parking facilities.
